Events that occurred on 16 July.

content.title: On Earth
content.content:
1919 - J.R.R. Tolkien is officially demobilized.
1924 - J.R.R. Tolkien is appointed Professor of English Language at the University of Leeds.
1940 - Beowulf and the Finnsburg Fragment, with contributions from J.R.R. Tolkien, is published.
1959 - Voice actor Bob Joles is born.
1964 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter 257.
1969 - Royd Tolkien is born.
1986 - Actor Calum Gittins is born.
1998 - Mythcon 29 in Wheaton, Illinois.
2004 - The Lord of the Rings Symphony in Seattle, Washington.
2006 - Tolkien Thing VIII in Diez, Germany.
2010 - Tolkien Thing 2010 in Bad Hersfeld, Germany.
2010 - Mythcon 41 in Dallas, Texas.
2011 - Tolkien Thing 2011 in Breuberg, Germany.
2011 - Mythcon 42 in Albuquerque, New Mexico.

content.title: In Arda
content.content:
T.A. 3018:
Gandalf is held captive by Saruman on the pinnacle of Orthanc.
Boromir travels towards Rivendell to ask for counsel.
